Question
========

Two categorical variables have exactly the same conditional probabilities in the population. These variables are then

Answerlist
----------

* Dependent.
* Independent.
* Correlated.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Dependent..: Incorrect
* Independent..: Correct
* Correlated: Incorrect
